mapper.select: SELECT fm_id AS fmId, phone, password, fm_name AS fmName, province, city, detailed_address AS detailedAddress , farm_type as farmType, farm_size AS farmSize, reg_time AS regTime, check_status AS checkStatus FROM farm_manager WHERE phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into farm_manager(phone, password, fm_name, province, city, detailed_address, farm_type, farm_size, reg_time, check_status) values (#{phone}, #{password}, #{fmName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{detailedAddress}, #{farmType}, #{farmSize}, #{regTime}, #{checkStatus})
mapper.update: update farm_manager set check_status = #{status} where phone = #{phone}
